name: TribalScale
description:
TribalScale is a leading innovation and software development firm specializing in the delivery of digital products. TribalScale partners with consumer brands to help validate and accelerate the development of mobile, web, and emerging platform experiences (e.g. voice, chat bots).
Leveraging Lean Validation and Extreme Programming techniques, TribalScale helps companies quickly respond to market opportunities and inspire their customers through delightful experiences.TribalScale is headquartered in Toronto, Canada with offices in Los Angeles and Dubai.
